import React from 'react'; import './AdjustmentProcess.css'; const AdjustmentProcess = () => { return (

Adjustment Process

We often don't realize how dependent we are on our senses until we lose one. Even losing taste, as you might experience when sick, suddenly highlights its importance. The adjustment process for vision loss can be even more significant.

Losing vision or any other sense requires an adjustment period. This can be challenging and involves learning new ways to navigate the world, both physically and emotionally. Be patient with yourself and seek resources to help you adapt. Remember, the adjustment process varies among individuals, and there's no need to worry if you can't adjust quickly. It is listed as the second step because it’s essential for moving forward in life, even if it takes a lifetime.

Counseling can be invaluable. Talking to a professional counselor or support group can provide emotional support, help you process your feelings, and develop coping strategies.

Listen to Pratik's story:

Counseling can be invaluable. Here are some key areas where counselors can provide support:

  • Individual Support: Counselors help individuals process their feelings, develop coping strategies, and adapt to their new reality. This one-on-one support is crucial for emotional well-being and personal growth.
  • Family Counseling: Counselors also work with families to help them understand the challenges their loved one is facing. They provide guidance on how to support their family member and adjust to changes together, fostering a supportive home environment.
  • Preparation and Education: Counselors educate both individuals and families about what to expect and how to manage daily life with vision loss. They offer practical advice and resources to help navigate this new chapter effectively.

Here are some examples for counseling services:

  • • New York Foundling - Counseling Services
  • • The Child Center of NY - Mental Health Services
  • • Jewish Community Council of Greater Coney Island - Mental Health Counseling
